content:
![brand]( https://horasearch.com/public/logo.svg)


**Hora æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¿‘ä¼¼æœ€è¿‘é‚»æœç´¢ç®—æ³• ([wiki]( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nearest_neighbor_search)) åº“**

**Hora** å®Œå…¨åŸºäº **RustğŸ¦€** å®ç°ï¼Œäº‹å®è¯æ˜ï¼Œ**Rust** ç¡®å®éå¸¸éå¸¸å¿«ï¼Œå®Œå…¨å¯ä»¥åª²ç¾ **C++** ï¼Œä¸”`Hora`ä½¿ç”¨ **SIMD**è¿›è¡Œäº†åŠ é€Ÿï¼Œé€Ÿåº¦éå¸¸å¿«âš¡ï¸âš¡ï¸âš¡ï¸ï¼Œå…·ä½“é€Ÿåº¦å¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒä¸‹é¢çš„ benchmark.

**Hora** ï¼Œæ—¥è¯­ä¸º **ã€Œã»ã‚‰ã€**ï¼Œè¯»æ³•åƒ **[hÅlÉ™]** ï¼Œæ„æ€æ˜¯ **Wow**, **You see!** , **Look at that!** ã€‚ è¿™ä¸ªåå­—çš„çµæ„Ÿæ¥è‡ªæ—¥æœ¬è‘—åæ­Œæ›² **[ã€Œå°ã•ãªæ‹ã®ã†ãŸã€]( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u8EkSB9zSpE)** ã€‚

**githubï¼š https://github.com/hora-search/hora**

**ä¸»é¡µï¼š https://horasearch.com/**

**Python åº“ï¼š https://github.com/hora-search/horapy**

**Javascript åº“ï¼š https://github.com/hora-search/hora-wasm**

Hora å®šä½ä¸Šæ˜¯**Rust**å®ç°çš„ ANN ç®—æ³•åº“ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›èƒ½åŸºäº Rust æœ¬èº«çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿæä¾›å¤šä¸ªå®‰å…¨çš„è¯­è¨€åº“ï¼Œä¸”èƒ½éƒ¨ç½²åœ¨ä»»ä½•åœ°æ–¹ã€‚ç›®å‰å·²ç»èƒ½åœ¨**Linux**, **macOS** å’Œ **Windows**ä»¥åŠ**WebAssembly**éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œæœªæ¥è¿˜ä¼šæ”¯æŒ**Android**å’Œ**IOS**ä»¥åŠ **åµŒå…¥å¼è®¾å¤‡**

*** 

### Demo 

è¿™æ˜¯ Hora çš„åœ¨çº¿æ¼”ç¤ºï¼ˆå¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ‰¾åˆ°å®ƒï¼Œå¼ºçƒˆæ¨èè¯•è¯•é€Ÿåº¦ï¼ï¼ [https://horasearch.com/]( https://horasearch.com/))

**ğŸ‘© Face-Match [[online demo]( https://horasearch.com/#Demos)], have a try!**

### benchmark

Hora éå¸¸å¿«ï¼Œbench ï¼ˆä¸ Faiss å’Œ Annoy ç›¸æ¯”ï¼‰

![demo3]( https://horasearch.com/public/fashion-mnist-784-euclidean_10_euclidean.png)

### Usage

å®‰è£…æä¸ºç®€å•ï¼š
**`Rust`**

```toml
[dependencies]

```

**`Python`**

```Bash
$ pip install horapy
```

**`Javascript (WebAssembly)`**


```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/hora-search/hora
$ cargo build
```

ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Š API ä¹Ÿéå¸¸ç®€å•:

**`Python` example** [[more info]( https://github.com/hora-search/horapy)]

```Python
import numpy as np
from horapy import HNSWIndex

dimension = 50
n = 1000

# init index instance
index = HNSWIndex(dimension, "usize")

samples = np.float32(np.random.rand(n, dimension))
for i in range(0, len(samples)):
    # add node
    index.add(np.float32(samples[i]), i)

index.build("euclidean")  # build index

target = np.random.randint(0, n)
# 410 in Hora ANNIndex <HNSWIndexUsize> (dimension: 50, dtype: usize, max_item: 1000000, n_neigh: 32, n_neigh0: 64, ef_build: 20, ef_search: 500, has_deletion: False)
# has neighbors: [410, 736, 65, 36, 631, 83, 111, 254, 990, 161]
print("{} in {} \nhas neighbors: {}".format(
    target, index, index.search(samples[target], 10)))  # search

```
